Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Number of times First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurs in the entire event log
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that contain First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation appearing after Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that is followed by Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Ratio of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation over Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of cases where First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation appears exactly once
Metric: the sum of the function base == 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurring in variants that end with Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in variants that include SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that occurs after a revision cycle (i.e., after RW-EIC Accept or RW-EIC Minor Revision)
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of variants in which First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation is preceded by First Look-Your updates are overdue
Metric: Frequency of activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' for cases where activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' occurs

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation events that belong to cases also containing SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation appearing within 7 days of First Look-Please submit updates
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'First Look-Please submit updates'

Name: Ratio of variants containing First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to total number of variants
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that is part of the final stage of the review process (i.e., after an EIC decision and before production)
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'
